verses.verse: And they continued<WH3427> three<WH7969> years<WH8141> without<WH369> war<WH4421> between<WH996> Syria<WH758> and Israel.<WH3478>

And he said<WH559> to Jehoshaphat,<WH3092> Will you go<WH3212> with me to battle<WH4421> to Ramothgilead?<WH7433> And Jehoshaphat<WH3092> said<WH559> to the king<WH4428> of Israel,<WH3478> I am as you are, my people<WH5971> as your people,<WH5971> my horses<WH5483> as your horses.<WH5483>
